title: mmr drop?
body: I "carried" 10 games in a row then i play  once bad and lose -200mmr on op.gg why?

replies.body:
https://euw.whatismymmr.com

use this instead, it's more accurate

Because it's a 3rd party site who cant accurately tell what anyone's MMR is, they can only guess based on who you play with

you use it for a general reference, not a full description
